name: Gray'd
description:
• Gray'd is a Unity game made in 72 hours for the Pre-Indie Game Jam. The theme of the jam was 'Colours'.
HOW TO PLAY
  • The current target is indicated by the coloured ball orbiting the centre. Press the Left Mouse Button to shoot this ball towards its desired target. Remember which colours represent which!
AUTHORS
  • Surya Rai - Design & Sound
  • Luke Powell - Code
